mapper.select: SELECT A1.TRSM_CD , A1.TRSM_NM , A1.TRSM_ENG_NM , A1.TRSM_ABBR , A1.APLCN_BGNG_YR , A1.APLCN_END_YR , A1.RLS_YN , A1.USE_YN , A1.SORT_SEQ , A3.USER_NM AS MDFCN_USER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A1.MDFCN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MDFCN_DT FROM TN_CAR_TRSM A1 INNER JOIN TN_USER A3 ON A1.MDFCN_USER_CD = A3.USER_CD WHERE A1.TRSM_CD = #{TRSM_CD}
